title: shakthi vinaayakam bajEham
sahitya:
shakti vinAyakam bhajEham candrakOTi prakAsha vadanam

caturbhujam shankarAtmajam 

(shakti)



anupallavi



muktidAyakam munigaNa sEvitam mOdakAdi paNIhAra bhUSitam

SaNmukhAgrajam 

(shakti)



caraNam



kanakAmbaradhara sOdari tanayam gambhIranAta rAga priyakaram

parama krpAsAgara gajamukha vadanam pATalIsvara jEStha bAlakam

brahmacAriNam 

(shakti)
